    • getAmountCapsules

      public int getAmountCapsules(int status)
      Gets the number of capsules with the specified status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status of the capsules to count. 0 for all, 1 for under review, 2 for approved, 3 for published.
      Returns:
      The number of capsules with the specified status.

    • getCapsuleInfo

      public String getCapsuleInfo(int capsulePosition, int capsuleStatus)
      Gets the information of the capsule at the specified position and with the specified status.
      Parameters:
      capsulePosition - The position of the capsule to get information for.
      capsuleStatus - The status of the capsule to get information for. 0 for all, 1 for under review, 2 for approved, 3
      Returns:
      capsuleInfo The information of the capsule choosed.

    • addCapsule

      public String addCapsule(String id, String description, String type, String lesson, ArrayList<String> hashtags)
      Adds a new capsule to the capsules array.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the capsule to be added.
      description - The description of the capsule.
      type - The type of the capsule.
      lesson - The lesson the capsule is associated with.
      hashtags - An ArrayList of hashtags associated with the capsule.
      Returns:
      A message indicating if the capsule was added successfully or if the maximum number of capsules has been reached.

    • approveCapsule

      public void approveCapsule(int capsulePos)
      Approves a capsule.
      Parameters:
      capsulePos - The position of the capsule in the capsulesUnderReview ArrayList.

    • publicCapsule

      public String publicCapsule(int capsulePos)
      Publishes a capsule.
      Parameters:
      capsulePos - The position of the capsule in the capsulesApproved ArrayList.
      Returns:
      The URL of the published capsule.
